name: Runner Dude Free Game
description:
- Welcome to the new game Runner Dude.
- A new HD graphics optimized
- You can help dude to collect many diamonds and overcome obstacles. Helps the little dude to escape from the helicopeter.
- Run into the open enviroement with the dude, avoiding obstacles, stones and subways. Retrieves a good number of Diamonds and get additional bonus as life. Do not give up at the first difficult dude never tired.
